scripts.deploy: concurrently -n contracts,client -c cyan,magenta "cd packages/contracts && yarn run dev" "cd packages/client && yarn run deploy"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n anvil,contracts,client -c blue,cyan,magenta "cd packages/scripts && yarn run anvil" "yarn run dev:contracts" "yarn run dev:client"
scripts.deploy:ca: yarn workspace @tenetxyz/base-ca run deploy:local && yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level2-ca run deploy:local && yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level3-ca run deploy:local
scripts.dev:contracts: yarn workspace @tenetxyz/registry run deploy && yarn run deploy:ca && yarn workspace @tenetxyz/contracts run deploy:local
scripts.mud:up: yarn workspaces foreach -t run yarn mud set-version -v canary && yarn install
